item.title: Publish pages for AP guides on activitypub.rocks
item.dc:creator: how
item.description:
Following up on the 2020-04-25 SocialCG Meeting

So we want to make the content of Guide for ActivityPub users and Guide for new ActivityPub implementers to the home page on https://activitypub.rocks.

@Sebastian proposed to publish a static page version of the wikis and keep the wikis alive, and have those static pages available as links from the site’s home page. This is a reminder for @cwebber to make the links available.

@cwebber: please link the following two “Published Pages”:

Wiki Page Published Page
Guide for ActivityPub users https://socialhub.activitypub.rocks/pub/guide-for-activitypub-users
Guide for new ActivityPub implementers https://socialhub.activitypub.rocks/pub/guide-for-new-activitypub-implementers

@nedjo: the wikis are now available as “published pages” so any edit should go to these URLs, with their own styling. (It’s now using the default styling. If someone has a better one, e.g., matching the activitypub.rocks style, go ahead and post it here – note that there is no obvious way to fix that style for now, but it should appear in time.)
